title: What should I do in Output?
content:
Nothing, but check the outputs generated by the Text Capture tool:

1. A folder with a name containing your task name, input folder name, and '_output_by_TC_': holds the description files tagged with character information.
2. A folder with a name containing your task name, input folder name, and '_ReviewedTerms_': holds the term categorization results.

Both folders may be used as input to Ontology Building tool or Matrix Generation tool.
